se3projecta.Persistence
Class XmlFileSaver

java.lang.Object
  se3projecta.Persistence.XmlFileSaver

public class XmlFileSaver
extends java.lang.Object

Allows Objects which implement the XmlSerializable interface to be saved as in an XML file in a serialized format.

          Saves a Map of objects which implement the XmlSerializable interface in an XML file in a serialized format.

Method Detail

save

public static <K,V extends XmlSerializable> void save(java.util.TreeMap<K,V> file,
                                                      java.lang.String Path)
                 throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                        javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                        javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
Saves a Map of objects which implement the XmlSerializable interface in an XML file in a serialized format.

Type Parameters:
K - the Data type of the key of the supplied map. Data type is that of the object ID.
V - the Data type of the value of the supplied map. Data type is that of the object itself.
Parameters:
file - a collection of objects which implement the XmlSerializable interface.
Path - where to save the generated XML file.
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
